name: Air Fryer Salt and Vinegar Chickpeas
author: France C
summary: This addictive little snack is sure to disappear quickly, so you might want to make two batches! These are best served immediately.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
directions: Combine chickpeas and vinegar in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer
Drain chickpeas, removing any loose skins
Preheat an air fryer to 390 degrees F (198 degrees C)
Spread chickpeas evenly in the basket
Cook until dried out, about 4 minutes
Transfer chickpeas into a heat-proof bowl and drizzle with oil and sea salt
Return chickpeas to the air fryer and cook, shaking basket every 2 to 3 minutes, until lightly browned, about 8 minutes
